attributes.description: This dashboard provides expanded alerts overview for Azure cloud
attributes.title: [Filebeat Azure] Alerts Overview
Subscriptions Filter [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "input_control_vis", "params": {"pinFilters": false, "useTimeFilter": false, "updateFiltersOnChange": true, "controls": [{"parent": "", "indexPatternRefName": "control_0_index_pattern", "label": "Subscription ID", "fieldName": "azure.subscription_id", "id": "1571250866125", "type": "list", "options": {"type": "terms", "size": 5, "multiselect": true, "dynamicOptions": true, "order": "desc"}}]}, "aggs": [], "title": "Subscriptions Filter [Filebeat Azure]"}

attributes.title: Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "metrics", "params": {"default_index_pattern": "metricbeat-*", "index_pattern": "filebeat-*", "default_timefield": "@timestamp", "series": [{"hide_in_legend": 0, "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "61ca57f2-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417"}], "line_width": 1, "color": "rgba(252,220,0,1)", "stacked": "none", "filter": {"query": "event.outcome: \"Activated\"", "language": "kuery"}, "separate_axis": 0, "split_mode": "filter", "chart_type": "line", "point_size": 1, "axis_position": "right", "formatter": "number", "id": "61ca57f1-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "fill": 0.5}, {"hide_in_legend": 0, "metrics": [{"type": "count", "id": "5a52f171-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a"}], "line_width": 1, "color": "#68BC00", "stacked": "none", "filter": {"query": "event.outcome: \"Resolved\" or event.outcome: \"Succeeded\"", "language": "kuery"}, "separate_axis": 0, "split_mode": "filter", "chart_type": "line", "point_size": 1, "axis_position": "right", "formatter": "number", "id": "5a52f170-ec1e-11e9-b6a7-21d19b63822a", "fill": 0.5}], "axis_formatter": "number", "interval": "", "isModelInvalid": false, "id": "61ca57f0-469d-11e7-af02-69e470af7417", "filter": {"query": "event.dataset :\"azure.activitylogs\" and event.category : \"Alert\"", "language": "kuery"}, "time_field": "", "show_legend": 0, "show_grid": 1, "axis_scale": "normal", "type": "timeseries", "axis_position": "left"}, "aggs": [], "title": "Alerts Overview [Filebeat Azure]"}

attributes.title: Alerts Count [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "metric", "params": {"type": "metric", "metric": {"style": {"bgFill": "#000", "bgColor": false, "fontSize": 60, "subText": "", "labelColor": false}, "colorSchema": "Green to Red", "invertColors": false, "labels": {"show": true}, "useRanges": false, "percentageMode": false, "colorsRange": [{"to": 10000, "from": 0, "type": "range"}], "metricColorMode": "None"}, "addTooltip": true, "dimensions": {"metrics": [{"type": "vis_dimension", "accessor": 1, "format": {"params": {}, "id": "number"}}], "bucket": {"type": "vis_dimension", "accessor": 0, "format": {"params": {}, "id": "string"}}}, "addLegend": false}, "aggs": [{"params": {"customLabel": "Alerts"}, "type": "count", "enabled": true, "id": "1", "schema": "metric"}, {"params": {"filters": [{"input": {"query": "event.outcome : \"Activated\"", "language": "kuery"}, "label": "Activated"}, {"input": {"query": "event.outcome : \"Resolved\"", "language": "kuery"}, "label": "Resolved"}, {"input": {"query": "event.outcome : \"Succeeded\"", "language": "kuery"}, "label": "Succeeded"}]}, "type": "filters", "enabled": true, "id": "2", "schema": "group"}], "title": "Alerts Count [Filebeat Azure]"}

attributes.title: Alerts Heatmap [Filebeat Azure]
attributes.visState: {"type": "heatmap", "params": {"colorSchema": "Greens", "invertColors": false, "dimensions": {"y": [{"params": {}, "aggType": "count", "accessor": 1, "format": {"id": "number"}}], "x": {"params": {}, "aggType": "terms", "accessor": 0, "format": {"params": {"otherBucketLabel": "Other", "id": "string", "missingBucketLabel": "Missing"}, "id": "terms"}}}, "type": "heatmap", "legendPosition": "right", "addLegend": true, "colorsRange": [], "colorsNumber": 4, "setColorRange": false, "percentageMode": false, "addTooltip": true, "valueAxes": [{"show": false, "labels": {"color": "black", "rotate": 0, "overwriteColor": false, "show": false}, "type": "value", "id": "ValueAxis-1", "scale": {"defaultYExtents": false, "type": "linear"}}], "enableHover": false, "times": []}, "aggs": [{"params": {}, "type": "count", "enabled": true, "id": "1", "schema": "metric"}, {"params": {"orderBy": "1", "missingBucket": false, "customLabel": "Provider", "missingBucketLabel": "Missing", "field": "azure.resource.provider", "otherBucketLabel": "Other", "otherBucket": false, "order": "desc", "size": 5}, "type": "terms", "enabled": true, "id": "2", "schema": "segment"}, {"params": {"orderBy": "1", "missingBucket": false, "customLabel": "Resource Group", "missingBucketLabel": "Missing", "field": "azure.resource.group", "otherBucketLabel": "Other", "otherBucket": false, "order": "desc", "size": 5}, "type": "terms", "enabled": true, "id": "3", "schema": "group"}], "title": "Alerts Heatmap [Filebeat Azure]"}
